title: Best of The Herd for May 28, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for May 28, 2020
description:
LeBron should be the MVP just like he should have been most of the past decade

Another Hall of Famer has an issue with Michael Jordan and the documentary

People are way too sensitive about Cam Newton

Tom Brady is happy to leave Boston

Colin participates in a spelling bee


Guest: Rob Parker, FS1 Instigator

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
